proposals.title: Standardize UTF-8 encoding on writes
proposals.rationale: Avoid BOM/UTF16 artifacts causing UnicodeDecodeError during exports.
patch: +All generated artifacts are written as UTF-8 (no BOM) to avoid decode issues across Windows tooling.

proposals.title: Add src/ layout (plan-only)
proposals.rationale: Improves import stability and makes packaging predictable.
patch: +Consider moving top-level python modules under src/ and using explicit packages.
